thread.title: Tony Vaughan

author: Tony Vaughan
title: Tony Vaughan
text: I order a passenger tail light assembly for my 1996 Dodge pickup after not finding any at wrecking yards, I got the driver side. I told them and they where more then happy to exchange it for me. I was at the scrap yard and their was a dodge truck bed with the ram head tail lights, I asked if I could buy them they told me two bucks I bought them and told my girl friend who put the driver side tail light on a garage sake site and sold it where I broke even with two free head lights everyone ended up winning.
